actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to make certain changes in the division within the Northern District of Ohio.

summary.text: Increases from two to three the number of divisions within the Northern District of Ohio. Requires each division to have at least one active judge sitting full time and at least one additional active judge sitting at least half time, unless, upon request of the chief judge of the Northern District of Ohio, the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit authorizes an alternative assignment.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to make certain changes in the division within the Northern District of Ohio.
